meanings.definition: The fleshy part of the human body that forms the buttocks.
meanings.sent1: She fell and landed on her bittocks.
meanings.sent2: He sat down on the bittocks to rest.
meanings.sent3: Carrying a heavy load, her bittocks were feeling the strain.
meanings.sent4: The bittocks of the mountain were covered in lush greenery.
meanings.sent5: The baby's chubby bittocks were adorable.

meanings.sent1: He slipped on the wet floor and landed right on his bittocks.
meanings.sent2: She giggled when her friend made a joke about her bittocks.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's bittocks joke had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The cat knocked over the vase with its tail swishing against the bittocks.
meanings.sent5: The bittocks of the statue were smooth and polished.
